subject: Re: Full Spectrum Cameras
author: draiga1
full_text:
I know what you mean. I just had to return a pedometer for lack of doing research first. The stupid thing kept resetting itself throughout the day. I looked up reveiews because it was doing that to me, and it turns out that was a common problem with that brand.

With bigger purchases I do research first, not after like the pedometer. Lol!

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kalin <kalinu@...> wrote:
>
> gotcha lol research is good..my husband says I'm alittle anal when it come to that.. I just hate buying something then reading later that it was crap or there was something better UGH!! LOL
>
